description: Some abilities are not tied to your race, class, or skill-things like particularly quick reflexes that allow you to react to danger more swiftly, the ability to craft magic items, the training to deliver powerful strikes with melee weapons, or the knack for deflecting arrows fired at you. These abilities are represented as feats. While some feats are more useful to certain types of characters than others, and many of them have special prerequisites that must be met before they are selected, as a general rule feats represent abilities outside of the normal scope of your character's race and class. Many of them alter or enhance class abilities or soften class restrictions, while others might apply bonuses to your statistics or grant you the ability to take actions otherwise prohibited to you. By selecting feats, you can customize and adapt your character to be uniquely yours.

Prerequisites: Some feats have prerequisites. Your character must have the indicated ability score, class feature, feat, skill, base attack bonus, or other quality designated in order to select or use that feat. A character can gain a feat at the same level at which he gains the prerequisite.

A character can't use a feat if he loses a prerequisite, but he does not lose the feat itself. If, at a later time, he regains the lost prerequisite, he immediately regains full use of the feat that prerequisite enables.

Champion of Destruction.shortDescription: You would destroy the world if it were within your power.

Champion of Grace.shortDescription: It is your mission to do as much good as possible.

Child of Two Worlds.prereqs: Whether through an elixir of two worlds (see page 62) or other means, one of your parents was aquatic and the other was a land-dweller. You are mostly a normal member of your race, except as stated in this feat. You must select this feat at 1st level, and you can't have other feats, traits, or abilities that specify your bloodline such as Racial Heritage. Thematically appropriate backgrounds include Adopted Outside Your Race, Bastard Born, Death in the Family, One of a Kind, and The Relative. These backgrounds are found in Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Intrigue.

Childlike.shortDescription: +2 on Disguise checks to look like human child, take 10 on Bluff checks

Chilling Amplification.shortDescription: Your cold spells cause creatures to become sluggish

Chimeric Adept.prereqs: ~`Chimeric aspect class feature`~, wild shape class feature

Claw Wrench.shortDescription: Grapple a creautre to break its own grab or negate bite attacks

Favored Community.prereqs: Knowledge (local) 2 ranks, must have lived in the settlement for at least 1 year

Favored Enemy Spellcasting.shortDescription: Spell DCs are 1 higher for your chosen enemy

Favored Judgment.shortDescription: Judgments have greater effect on creatures of a specific type, chosen from the ranger's favored enemy list

Favored Prestige Class.shortDescription: Levels in your chosen prestige class grant your favored class bonus

Fear Eater.prereqs: Cha 13, Iron Will, have no immunity to fear effects

Fearless Aura.prereqs: Aura of courage class feature, caster level 8th

Fearless Zeal.prereqs: You must be ordained as a sacred (or profane) champion of your faith by a high-ranking member of its clergy, or have the Devoted, Faith-Bringer, or Moral Debt background. Such an honor goes above and beyond the normal oaths required of a cleric or paladin.
Fearless Zeal.shortDescription: Become a living symbol of your faith

Fearsome Barricade.shortDescription: Demoralize opponents that attack your allies

Fearsome Spell-Like Ability.shortDescription: Spell-like ability makes damaged foes shaken

Feign Curse.shortDescription: Trick an enemy into thinking she's cursed

Feint Defender.prereqs: Shield Focus, base attack bonus +6 or fighter level 4th, Sense Motive 1 rank.

Feinting Flurry.prereqs: Dex 15, flurry of blows class feature, Combat Expertise

Felling Smash.prereqs: Int 13, Str 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6

Fencing Grace.shortDescription: Use Dexterity on rapier damage rolls

Feral Grace.prereqs: Weapon Finesse, base attack bonus +3, animal companion

Ferocious Loyalty.shortDescription: Bonus on attacks when the enemy threatens or knocks out your allies

Ferocious Tenacity.prereqs: Ferocity racial trait, half-orc or orc, rage class feature

Fey Friend.prereqs: Worshiper of one of the Eldest

Fey Spell Lore.prereqs: Cha 13, Spellcraft 1 rank, ability to cast druid spells

Fiendish Heritage.prereqs: Tiefling, must be taken at 1st level

Fiendish Serpent.shortDescription: Gain climb and swim speeds, can't be tripped

Fiendish Wings.prereqs: Non-native outsider with the evil subtype

Finishing Cascade.prereqs: Base attack bonus +11 or ~`monk level 11th`~; at least one ~`combination feat`~

Firebrand.shortDescription: Use a torch as a deadly weapon.

Flagellant.prereqs: Endurance, character level 7th, worshiper of Zon-Kuthon

Flickering Step.shortDescription: Use dimension door as a spell-like ability

Flight Mastery.prereqs: Use Magic Device 3 ranks, base Fortitude save bonus +6

Focused Animal Expertise.shortDescription: Gain a bonus on Stealth checks

Focused Construct Expertise.shortDescription: Bypass hardness and some types of damage reduction

Focused Disbelief.shortDescription: Gain SR 11 + level against certain divine sources

Focused Discipline.shortDescription: Gain temporary combat bonuses after resisting fear effects

Focused Ooze Expertise.shortDescription: Gain acid resistance and a bonus to your combat maneuver defense

Focused Outsider Expertise.shortDescription: Ignore an amount of alignment-based damage reduction

Focused Overseer.shortDescription: Purchase capital for a lesser cost

Focused Phantom.shortDescription: Gain +4 on concentration checks while phantom is adjacent or within your consciousness

Focused Target.prereqs: Studied target class feature (second studied target).

Foeslayer.prereqs: You must have been defeated and robbed of at least half your possessions by a particular group of humanoids or monstrous humanoids, or have the An Eye for an Eye, Hated Foe, Raiders, or Vengeance background (see Ultimate Campaign). You may choose a specific race, such as duergar, or a broader group, such as goblinoids. At the GM's discretion, you may instead choose residents of a particular country, settlement, or tribe.
Foeslayer.shortDescription: Improve your battle prowess against the chosen enemy

Forceful Charge.prereqs: Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, animal companion

Forgotten Past.prereqs: You must have suffered permanent memory loss or have the Reincarnated background.

Fortuitous Vigor.shortDescription: Spend vigor when you roll a natural 20

Fortunate Manager.shortDescription: Have greater control over the events in your buildings

Fortunate One.shortDescription: Increase your Adaptable Luck uses by 1

Fortunate Ruler.prereqs: Hold the Ruler leadership role for a kingdom.
Fortunate Ruler.shortDescription: Have greater control over the events in your kingdom

Forward from Beneath.prereqs: Be a member of House Kastner, be a good-aligned member of a family or organization whose secret evil has been publicly revealed, or have the Dishonored Family or Betrayal backgrounds

Fox Trickery.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Fox Insight, Fox Style, Improved Dirty Trick

Furious Finish.prereqs: Rage class feature, Vital Strike, base attack bonus +6

Furious Focus.prereqs: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1

Furious Spell.shortDescription: Spell deals more damage and can be cast while in a rage

Fury's Snare.shortDescription: Entangle an opponent in your whip when tripping them

Garen's Discipline.shortDescription: Gain a bonus to a saving throw when fighting defensively

Ghost Hunting Team.shortDescription: You can grant the ghost touch property to your allies weapons

Ghost Whisperer.shortDescription: Communicate more easily with the dead and undead

Ghostslayer.shortDescription: Damage incorporeal creatures as though weapon were magical or Ghost Touch

Giant-Bane Caster.prereqs: Caster level 4th, favored enemy (giants) class feature
Giant-Bane Caster.shortDescription: Giants have a harder time resisting your spells

Giant-Killer Stance.shortDescription: Treat reach weapons as if they had the brace quality against larger opponents

Giant's Crush.prereqs: Str 13, Power Attack, Vital Strike, base attack bonus +6, giant subtype

Giant's Smash.shortDescription: Ignore 5 hardness on objects, +5 Strength to break down doors

Gifted Mesmerist.prereqs: Successfully affect 25 different targets with charm or compulsion spells
Gifted Mesmerist.shortDescription: Gain a charm or compulsion spell-like ability

Gilded Weapons.prereqs: Aphorite, crystalline dust racial trait, nonchaotic alignment

Gliding Steps.prereqs: Dodge, Mobility, Nimble Moves, ki pool

Gloom Sight.shortDescription: Gain darkvision 90 ft. at the cost of light sensitivity

Gloom Strike.shortDescription: +1 attack when within dim light or darkness

Gloomstorm.prereqs: Knowledge (planes) 4 ranks, shadow weapon class feature
Gloomstorm.shortDescription: Create new shadow weapons as a free action

Glorious Blaze.shortDescription: Preform a wild dance in honor of Sarenrae to aid your allies

Glorious Heat.prereqs: Ability to cast divine spells, caster level 5th, worshiper of Sarenrae

Gluttonous Gobbler.prereqs: Both Improved Unarmed Strike and Improved Grapple or the grab ability, ogre, size Large or larger

Gnawer.shortDescription: Ignore hardness with your powerful bite

Gnome Trickster.prereqs: Cha 13, gnome, gnome magic racial trait
Gnome Trickster.shortDescription: Use mage hand and prestidigitation once per day

Gnome Weapon Focus.prereqs: Base attack bonus +1, gnome, proficient with all martial weapons

Go Unnoticed.shortDescription: Make Stealth check against flat-footed opponents during first round of combat

Goblin Cleaver.shortDescription: Target additional creatures during cleave if smaller than you, gain +2 attack against them

Golden League Tattoos.prereqs: Regional trait associated with one of the Dragon Empires nations (Pathfinder Player Companion: Dragon Empires Primer)
Golden League Tattoos.shortDescription: Take 10 on Intimidate checks against creatures able to see your tattoos.

Golem's Conviction.prereqs: ~`Improved Iron Will`~, ~`Iron Will`~, base attack bonus +8
Golem's Conviction.shortDescription: When initially mind controlled, temporarily retain some autonomy

Gore Fiend.prereqs: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature
Gore Fiend.shortDescription: Regain rage by confirming a critical or receiving one

Gorgon's Fist.shortDescription: Stagger a foe whose speed is reduced

Gory Finish.shortDescription: Make an Intimidate check if you reduce an opponent to negative hit points

Grab and Go.prereqs: ~`Catch Off-Guard`~ or ~`Throw Anything`~, base attack bonus +1

Grabbing Drag.prereqs: Grabbing Style, Improved Grapple; base attack bonus +8, brawler level 4th, or monk level 4th

Grabbing Master.prereqs: Grabbing Drag, Grabbing Style, Improved Grapple; base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th
Grabbing Master.shortDescription: Grab two foes instead of just one

Grabbing Style.prereqs: Improved Grapple; base attack bonus +6, brawler's flurry class feature, or flurry of blows class feature
Grabbing Style.shortDescription: Take no penalty for grabbing a foe one-handed, retain your Dex bonus to AC when pinning

Graceful Athlete.prereqs: Acrobatics 1 rank, Climb 1 rank, Swim 1 rank, racial bonus to Dexterity
Graceful Athlete.shortDescription: Use Dexterity instead of Strength for Climb and Swim

Graceful Steal.prereqs: Dex 13, Agile Maneuvers, Improved Steal, Sleight of Hand 3 ranks
Graceful Steal.shortDescription: Steal outside of combat and from containers

Grand Duchy Familiarity.prereqs: Base attack bonus +3, proficiency with at least one firearm
Grand Duchy Familiarity.shortDescription: Reroll a missed attack once per day

Grand Master Performer.prereqs: Bardic performance class feature, Extra Performance, Master Performer, bard level 8th, Kitharodian Academy 20 TPA
Grand Master Performer.shortDescription: Increase the bonus of your bardic abilities by +1

Grant Initiative.shortDescription: Grant bonus to initiative to ally

Grasping Strike.prereqs: Nature Magic or the ability to cast druid or ranger spells; Vital Strike, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks
Grasping Strike.shortDescription: Entangle those you hit with Vital Strike

Grasping Tail.shortDescription: Use your tail to grab small stowed objects as a swift action

Graverisen.prereqs: Die and be brought back at least twice
Graverisen.shortDescription: Gain a supernatural ability to save yourself from death

Gravitational Vital Strike.prereqs: Vital Strike; Heavy Gravity Acclimation or Light Gravity Acclimation
Gravitational Vital Strike.shortDescription: Deal additional damage in heavy or light gravity

Gray Maiden Initiate.prereqs: Female, must be taken at 1st level
Gray Maiden Initiate.shortDescription: Become affiliated with Gray Maidens and gain two benefits of your choice

Great Cleave.shortDescription: Make an additional attack after each attack hits

Great Expectations.prereqs: Rainkin half-orc, skilled alternate racial trait
Great Expectations.shortDescription: Gain a bonus on certain skills, depending on your chosen mental ability score

Great Hatred.shortDescription: Additional +1 attack against targets of your hatred

Great Rend.shortDescription: Deal additional damage with your rend when biting

Greater Awesome Blow.prereqs: Str 25, Awesome Blow, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, size Large or larger
Greater Awesome Blow.shortDescription: Your awesome blows send enemies further

Greater Balor Whip.prereqs: Balor Whip, Improved Balor Whip, Weapon Focus (whip), Whip Mastery, base attack bonus +16
Greater Balor Whip.shortDescription: Increase your critical threat range when using Improved Balor Whip

Greater Beast Hunter.prereqs: Beast Hunter; Improved Beast Hunter; base attack bonus +6; Knowledge (nature) or Survival 6 ranks
Greater Beast Hunter.shortDescription: Act normally in surprise round when surprised by an animal in chosen terrain; +4 bonus on rolls to confirm critical hits against animals native to that terrain

Greater Bless Equipment.prereqs: Bless Equipment, Improved Bless Equipment, caster level 12th, channel energy class feature

Greater Blighted Critical.shortDescription: Confirm a critical hit with a spell or spell-like ability to inflict a random major spellblight

Greater Blind-Fight.shortDescription: Total concealment is considered normal concealment

Greater Blood Frenzy.shortDescription: No penalty to AC and gain rend while in blood frenzy

Greater Bull Rush.prereqs: Improved Bull Rush, base attack bonus +6
Greater Bull Rush.shortDescription: Enemies you bull rush provoke attacks of opportunity

Greater Called Shot.prereqs: Int 13, ~`Combat Expertise`~, ~`Improved Called Shot`~, base attack bonus +6
Greater Called Shot.shortDescription: You can make multiple called shots per round

Greater Channel Force.prereqs: Channel Force, Improved Channel Force, aasimar, channel energy 6d6

Kyton Cut.prereqs: Wis 17, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (spiked chain), Kyton Shield, Kyton Style, base attack bonus +8 or monk level 6th, Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, ki pool class feature

Kyton Shield.prereqs: Wis 15, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (spiked chain), Kyton Style, base attack bonus +5, Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, ki pool class feature

Kyton Style.shortDescription: Use a spiked chain as a monk weapon and deliver Stunning Fist through it

Lantern Style.shortDescription: Your thrown weapons shed light for one round

Leaping Shot.prereqs: Dex 13, grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Dodge, Mobility, base attack bonus +4.
Leaping Shot.shortDescription: May move your speed and make firearm attacks

Ledge Walker.prereqs: Dex 13, dwarf, mountaineer or stability racial trait

Legionnaire's Inspiration.shortDescription: Grant allies +1 morale bonus to AC

Liberator.prereqs: You must have been enslaved for at least 6 months, or have the Imprisoned or Kidnapped background (see Ultimate Campaign).
Liberator.shortDescription: Inspire others to join your cause

Life Lure.shortDescription: Channel positive energy to fascinate undead

Lifebound.shortDescription: Excess healing becomes temporary hit points

Lifecrafting.shortDescription: Create a new wyrwood from an ioun stone

Life-Dominant Soul.shortDescription: Gain half normal healing from positive and negative energy instead of full from negative

Linnorm Wrath.shortDescription: When you use the Linnorm Vengeance feat to allow an enemy to hit you, you can make a retaliatory unarmed strike attack against that opponent as an immediate action. This acts as an attack of opportunity, and counts against the number of attacks of opportunity you can make each round. Additionally, once per day when a melee attack deals enough damage to knock you unconscious or kill you, the attacker must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or be stunned for 1 round. This save occurs after you make the retaliatory unarmed strike granted by the Linnorm Vengeance feat.

Lithe Attacker.prereqs: Narrow Frame, Escape Artist 5 ranks, animal or magical beast

Longshanks.prereqs: Giant subtype, size Large or larger

Maddening Style.shortDescription: ain additional use of Stunning Fist, increase DC  of madness effects, and deal Wisdom/sanity damage with Stunning Fist

Master of Knowledge.prereqs: Int 17, Skill Focus (Knowledge [any]), worshiper of Irori

Master of Wonders.shortDescription: Roll twice when using a rod of wonder

Master of Your Kind.prereqs: Familiar, speak with animals of its kind ability

Master Performer.shortDescription: Increase your bardic performance bonuses by +1

Master Siege Engineer.shortDescription: Crew can load siege engine as a move action

Master Sniper.prereqs: Expert Sniper, Rapid Shot, Stealth 6 ranks

Masterful Display.prereqs: Dazzling Display, any two performance feats.
Masterful Display.shortDescription: Gain benefits of two performance feats

Masterful Flourish.shortDescription: Add weapon training to performance checks

Mauler's Endurance.prereqs: Must have a familiar with the mauler archetype (see page 11)

Maximized Spellstrike.prereqs: Maximized magic magus arcana, weapon expertise class feature or Quick Draw
Maximized Spellstrike.shortDescription: Maximize spellstrike by spending 3 arcana pool points

Measured Response.prereqs: Base attack bonus +1, worshiper of Abadar
Measured Response.shortDescription: When you hit with a melee or ranged weapon attack, you can choose to deal the average amount of damage

Meditative Concentration.prereqs: Wis 13, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 5th

Medusa's Wrath.shortDescription: Make 2 extra attacks against a hindered foe

Menacing Bane.shortDescription: May imbue weapon with menacing special quality

Mental Derail.shortDescription: Shout nonsense to distract a creature

Mental Stare.shortDescription: Your hypnotic stare doesn't rely on sight

Merciful Bane.shortDescription: Switch damage from lethal to nonlethal as a swift action

Merciful Spell.shortDescription: Spell inflicts nonlethal damage instead of lethal

Merciful Takedown.shortDescription: You can knock a creature out with a coup de grace

Merciless Rush.prereqs: Improved Bull Rush, worshiper of Rovagug
Merciless Rush.shortDescription: When your bull rush exceeds your target's CMD by 5 or more, deal damage equal to your Strength modifier

Messenger of Fate.prereqs: Ability to cast augury, worshiper of Pharasma
Messenger of Fate.shortDescription: Cast divination spells at +1 caster level, and increase your chance for correct divination

Meta Word Mastery.shortDescription: Gain additional uses of meta words per day

Metallic Wings.prereqs: Angelic Blood, Angelic Flesh, Angel Wings, aasimar, character level 11th

Meteor Swing.prereqs: ~`Weapon Focus`~ with bludgeoning weapon, base attack bonus +6
Meteor Swing.shortDescription: You can knock a target off balance with a bludgeoning weapon

Mighty Bite.prereqs: Base attack bonus +6, bite attack, rend, troll

Mindful Meditation.shortDescription: Gain a bonus on Will saving throws vs charm, compuslsion, emotion, and fear effects

Mindfulness Mastery.prereqs: Wis 19, Meditation Master, Mindful Meditation, character level 13th

Minor Miracle.prereqs: Wis 12, Knowledge (religion) 5 ranks, alignment must match that of your worshiped deity
Minor Miracle.shortDescription: Gain a spell-like ability from one of your deities domains

Minotaur's Charge.prereqs: Str 13, Improved Bull Rush, powerful charge
Minotaur's Charge.shortDescription: Initiate a bull rush with a charge attack

Mirror Kin.prereqs: Bluff 8 ranks, gnome, gnome magic racial trait

Mirror Move.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +4

Mischievous Tail.prereqs: Dex 15, Grasping Tail, you must have a tail

Misdirection Redirection.shortDescription: When using Misdirection Tactics, redirect attack to another creature

Misdirection Tactics.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Deceitful, Bluff 4 ranks
Misdirection Tactics.shortDescription: While using total defense, use Bluff to negate a hit

Mixed Scales.prereqs: Draconic Aspect or dragon-scaled racial trait, kobold.
Mixed Scales.shortDescription: Gain the powers of two scale colors

Mobile Bulwark Style.prereqs: Str 13, Shield Focus, Tower Shield Proficiency, base attack bonus +1

Mobile Fortress.prereqs: Str 15, Mobile Bulwark Style, Shield Focus, Tower Shield Proficiency, base attack bonus +4
Mobile Fortress.shortDescription: Add half your shield bonus to AC to your touch AC

Mobile Stronghold.prereqs: Str 17, Mobile Bulwark Style, Mobile Fortress, Shield Focus, Tower Shield Proficiency, base attack bonus +7
Mobile Stronghold.shortDescription: Gain cover vs spells and total cover vs one attack as an immediate action

Mocking Dance.shortDescription: May either move 5 feet without provoking attacks of opportunity, or your speed with them

Modification Master.prereqs: Creative Armorsmith, Armor Adept, and Craft (armor) 7 ranks, or Creative Weaponsmith, Weapon Adept, and Craft (weapons) 7 ranks; Knowledge (engineering) 7 ranks
Modification Master.shortDescription: You can add an armor or weapon modification to an item that already has a modification

Modification Trainer.prereqs: Cha 13, Armor Adept or Weapon Adept, fighter level 4th
Modification Trainer.shortDescription: You can train others to use modified armor or weapons

Modified Weapon Proficiency.shortDescription: Always have proficiency with modified versions of a single weapon

Monastic Legacy.prereqs: Still mind class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.
Monastic Legacy.shortDescription: Count half your non-monk levels as monk levels for unarmed strike damage

Monitor Obedience.prereqs: Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, must worship a monitor demigod

Monkey Moves.prereqs: Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Monkey Style, Acrobatics 8 ranks, Climb 8 ranks

Monkey Shine.prereqs: Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Monkey Moves, Monkey Style, Stunning Fist, Acrobatics 11 ranks, Climb 11 ranks
Monkey Shine.shortDescription: After successful Stunning Fist, you may enter an adjacent square

Monkey Style.prereqs: Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 5 ranks, Climb 5 ranks
Monkey Style.shortDescription: Add Wisdom bonus on Acrobatics checks, and take no penalty for attacking while prone

Monstrous Companion.prereqs: Handle Animal 7 ranks; class feature that functions as the druid animal companion ability (including animal companion, divine bond [mount], hunter's bond [animal companion], nature's bond [animal companion], and the mount class feature) with an effective druid level of 7

Monstrous Crafter.prereqs: Craft Wondrous Item, Grisly Ornament, Harvest Parts
Monstrous Crafter.shortDescription: Integrate an ornament into a magic item to gain its benefit once per day

Monstrous Mask.prereqs: Tiefling, must be taken at 1st level

Monstrous Masquerade.prereqs: Monstrous Disguise, Disguise 9 ranks, Knowledge (nature) 9 ranks

Monstrous Mount.prereqs: Handle Animal 4 ranks; Ride 4 ranks; divine bond (mount), hunter's bond (animal companion), or mount class feature with an effective druid level of 4

Monument Builder.prereqs: Knowledge (engineering) 1 rank, and you must have built a structure worth at least 5,000 gp.
Monument Builder.shortDescription: Increase the value of your constructions and gain bonuses to Knowledge (engineering)

Moonlight Stalker.prereqs: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Bluff 3 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait
Moonlight Stalker.shortDescription: Gain +2 on damage and attack rolls when you have concealment vs. foe

Moonlight Stalker Feint.prereqs: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Improved Feint, Moonlight Stalker, Bluff 6 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait
Moonlight Stalker Feint.shortDescription: Make a Bluff check to feint with concealment vs. foe

Moonlight Stalker Master.prereqs: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Improved Feint, Moonlight Stalker, Moonlight Stalker Feint, Bluff 9 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait
Moonlight Stalker Master.shortDescription: While concealed, miss chance increases by 10%

Moonlight Summons.prereqs: Spell Focus (conjuration), able to cast summon nature's ally
Moonlight Summons.shortDescription: Summoned creatures are immune to confusion and sleep effects, and their natural weapons are treated as silver

Moontouched.shortDescription: Gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude and Reflex saves but take a -2 penalty to Will saves at night when the moon is at least partially showing

Morrigna's Wrappings.prereqs: Character level 9th, ~`duskwalker`~, ward against corruption racial trait
Morrigna's Wrappings.shortDescription: Use a spider web to increase your racial resistance to death magic

Motivated March.shortDescription: Reduce damage when leading a forced march

Motivating Display.shortDescription: Motivate your allies while demoralizing your foes

Mountain Eyes.shortDescription: Overcome vision penalties due to gases and weather effects

Mountaineer.shortDescription: Gain +2 on Climb checks and +4 on saves to avoid high altitude effects; you acclimate to altitudes more quickly

Mountain-Splitting Strike.shortDescription: Unarmed and stunning fist attacks are mroe effective on a charge

Mounted Archery.shortDescription: Halve the penalty for ranged attacks while mounted

Mounted Blade.prereqs: Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack, Ride 3 ranks
Mounted Blade.shortDescription: Attack an adjacent foe with Ride-By-Attack

Mounted Combat.shortDescription: Avoid attacks on mount with Ride check

Mounted Shield.shortDescription: Apply shield bonus to mount's AC

Mounted Skirmisher.prereqs: Ride rank 14, Mounted Combat, Trick Riding
Mounted Skirmisher.shortDescription: Make a full attack if mount moves its speed or less

Mud in Your Eye.shortDescription: Use mud and dirt to perform dirty tricks

Muddled Morals.shortDescription: Bonus on saving throws against alignment effects, treated as different alignment when drunk

Multitalented Mastery.prereqs: Character level 5th, half-elf, multitalented racial trait
Multitalented Mastery.shortDescription: Consider all classes as favored classes

Multiweapon Defense.shortDescription: Sacrifice some attacks to parry blows.

Multiweapon Fighting.shortDescription: Reduce the penalties for fighting with multiple weapons from -6/-10 to -2/-6.

Multiweapon Specialist.shortDescription: Gain bonus damage when the weapons you wield are from the same group.

Murderer's Circle.shortDescription: When you make a performance combat check after a critical, move 5 feet

Murderous Sniper.shortDescription: You can make a death attack from range

Murky Spell.shortDescription: Cloud effects work underwater, with penalties

Murmurs of Earth.prereqs: Echoes of Stone, character level 9th, oread
Murmurs of Earth.shortDescription: Gain a limited form of tremorsense

Musketeer's Dodge.prereqs: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (firearms), gunslinger level 3rd, gunslinger's dodge deed
Musketeer's Dodge.shortDescription: Increase the bonus from gunslinger's dodge and your movement doesn't provoke

Musketeer's Reposition.prereqs: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (firearms), gunslinger level 6th, pistol-whip deed
Musketeer's Reposition.shortDescription: When you use the pistol-whip deed, you can reposition instead of tripping

Mutated Shape.prereqs: Wis 19, base attack bonus +6, wild shape class feature

Mutilating Ritualist.prereqs: Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks, Knowledge (religion) 4 ranks, Spellcraft 4 ranks
Mutilating Ritualist.shortDescription: Mutilate yourself to enhance a ritual

My Blade is Yours.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Sense Motive 3 ranks
My Blade is Yours.shortDescription: Use a weapon special quality from adjacent ally's weapon

Mystic Stride.prereqs: Dex 15, Nimble Moves, woodland stride class feature
Mystic Stride.shortDescription: Move at full speed even through magically enhanced foliage

Named Bullet.prereqs: Amateur Gunslinger feat or grit class feature, Gunsmithing, base attack bonus +5

Narrow Frame.prereqs: Escape Artist 1 rank, animal or magical beast

Nation Builder.prereqs: You must have explored and claimed an area of at least 100 square miles.

Natural Jouster.prereqs: Centaur (or any tauric creature at the GM's discretion)

Natural Poison Antitoxin.prereqs: Natural Poison Harvester, Craft (alchemy) 8 ranks, Survival 8 ranks

Natural Ruler.prereqs: Hold a leadership role related to running a kingdom.

Nature Magic.shortDescription: Gain know direction as a constant ability and use one other druid orison once per day

Nature Soul.shortDescription: +2 bonus on Knowledge (nature) and Survival checks.

Nature's Freedom.prereqs: Animal or Plant domain; channel energy class feature

Nature's Wrath.prereqs: Int 1, any nongood alignment, plant type

Neckbreaker.prereqs: Bonebreaker, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Jawbreaker, Stunning Fist, Heal 12 ranks

Nemesis.prereqs: You must have at least one enemy who wishes to cause you great harm. If you have multiple enemies, the GM may keep the specific nemesis secret, or have many of your enemies work together against you. If your nemesis is not already a challenging foe, it either advances in strength to become a challenging foe or allies with others to achieve a higher challenge rating.
Nemesis.shortDescription: Gain extra benefits when leveling in your favored class

Net Adept.prereqs: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), base attack bonus +1

Net and Trident.prereqs: Dex 15, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, Two-Weapon Fighting
Net and Trident.shortDescription: May wield a one-handed or light weapon with a net

Net Maneuvering.prereqs: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, base attack bonus +3

Net Trickery.prereqs: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, Net Maneuvering, base attack bonus +6

Never Conquered, Forever Feared.prereqs: Be a member of House Heskillar, or have the Adopted by Dragons, Path of Righteous Rage, or Proud Heritage background

New Thassilonian Magic.prereqs: Thassilonian specialization (Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Magic 17)

Night Sky Hex.prereqs: Hex class feature; moon, stars, or winter patron

Nightmare Chains.prereqs: Kyton subtype, 5 or more Hit Dice

Nightmare Fist.prereqs: Improved Unarmed Strike, Intimidate 1 rank, ability to create magical darkness

Nightmare Striker.prereqs: Improved Unarmed Strike, Nightmare Fist, Nightmare Weaver, Stunning Fist, Heal 5 ranks, ability to cast faerie fire

Nightmare Weaver.prereqs: Improved Unarmed Strike, Nightmare Fist, Intimidate 2 ranks, ability to cast darkness
Nightmare Weaver.shortDescription: Can demoralize foes while casting darkness.

Nimble Natural Summons.prereqs: Augmented Summoning, Spell Focus (conjuration), ability to cast summon nature's ally, caster level 6th, worshiper of Erastil

Nimble Striker.prereqs: Dex 13, base attack bonus +1, catfolk, sprinter racial trait

No Name.prereqs: Grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Bluff 4 ranks.

Noble Impostor.prereqs: Must not be a member of an established family or a member of nobility

Noble Scion.prereqs: Cha 13, must be taken at 1st level
Noble Scion.shortDescription: +2 on Knowledge (nobility) plus gain a nobility-related boon

Noble Scion (Cheliax).prereqs: Cheliax affinity, member of Chelish noble house
Noble Scion (Cheliax).shortDescription: Gain a bonus from your noble house

Noble Scion (Taldor Variant).prereqs: Charisma 13 or ~`Child of Oppara`~ trait, must be taken at 1st level
Noble Scion (Taldor Variant).shortDescription: You are a member of a Taldan noble house

Noble Spell Resistance.prereqs: Cha 13, Wis 13, Greater Drow Nobility, character level 13th, drow

Object of Legend.prereqs: You must have some highly personal stake in attaining the object of your quest as determined collectively by you and the GM'such as needing an ancestral weapon to exact your revenge against a known betrayer, seeking to destroy the artifact that caused your family's downfall generations ago, or attempting to behead a monster that ravaged your homeland during your youth.

Oblivating Stare.prereqs: Allure bold stare improvement (Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures 42), hypnotic stare class feature (Occult Adventures 39), Mesmerist level 5th

Occult Conduit.prereqs: Caster level 5th, ~`implements class feature, mental focus class feature`~, ~`wyrwood`~

Ogre Crush.prereqs: Str 25, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, ogre, size Large or larger

Omnipresent Mentor.prereqs: Cha 17, Inspiring Mentor, inspire competence bardic performance

One Finger.prereqs: Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist, Weapon Finesse, base attack bonus +8, ki strike class ability

One-Inch Punch.prereqs: ~`Improved Unarmed Strike`~, base attack bonus +6, ~`brawler's flurry class feature`~ or ~`flurry of blows class feature`~

Onslaught.prereqs: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1, sneak attack class feature

Ooze Companion.prereqs: Ooze Whisperer, animal companion, wild empathy

Open Conduit.prereqs: Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks or outsider with the native subtype

Orc Fury Style.prereqs: Bullying Blow, Intimidating Prowess, Intimidate 3 ranks, weapon familiarity racial trait

Orc Hewer.prereqs: Str 13, Cleave, Goblin Cleaver, Power Attack, dwarf
Orc Hewer.shortDescription: +2 bonus to attack when cleaving orcs

Orc Rampage.prereqs: Bullying Blow, Intimidating Prowess, Orc Fury Style, Intimidate 5 ranks, weapon familiarity racial trait

Orc Snarl.prereqs: Bullying Blow, Intimidating Prowess, Orc Fury Style, Orc Rampage, Intimidate 7 ranks, weapon familiarity racial trait
Orc Snarl.shortDescription: +4 save vs. effects created by shaken foes

Orc Weapon Expertise.shortDescription: Learn unique abilities with orc weapons

Oread Earth Glider.prereqs: Oread Burrower, Stony Step, character level 13th, oread

Osirionology.prereqs: Knowledge (history) 1 rank, Knowledge (local) 1 rank, must be able to speak Osiriani and Ancient Osiriani

Osiriontologist.prereqs: Knowledge (history) 4 ranks, Knowledge (local) 4 ranks, Speak Language (Osiriani, Ancient Osiriani)
Osiriontologist.shortDescription: Gain bonuses to multiple skills while in Osirion

Ostentatious Display.shortDescription: Gain bonuses from wearing valuable nonmagical items

Ostentatious Rager.shortDescription: Rage as a performance for money or to distract enemies

Ostentatious Weakness.prereqs: Base attack bonus +5, favored enemy class feature
Ostentatious Weakness.shortDescription: Add favored enemy bonuses to performance checks

Otherworldly Influence.prereqs: You must have refused an evil creature with at least 15 Hit Dice who offered gifts or assistance, have refused an evil creature offering to cast a spell of 7th-level or higher on your behalf, or have the Planar Offering background

Our Bounty, Our Glory.prereqs: Be a member of House Denzarni, or have the Bloodthirsty, Omen, Tree Tender, or Unsuspecting Master background

Outer Planes Traveler.prereqs: Knowledge (planes) 11 ranks, ability to cast plane shift or gate as a spell or spell-like ability
Outer Planes Traveler.shortDescription: Improve your casting ability and resistance with a type of spell familiar to a specific plane.

Outslug Style.prereqs: Int 13; Combat Expertise or brawler's cunning class feature; Weapon Focus with the chosen weapon
Outslug Style.shortDescription: +1 to AC and damage when taking a 5-foot step with a chosen weapon

Outslug Weave.prereqs: Int 13; Combat Expertise or brawler's cunning class feature; Lunge; Outslug Style; Weapon Focus with the chosen weapon

Overachiever.prereqs: You must have been defeated by the same individual, organization, or creature type at least four times, or have the Boarding School or Humiliated background

Overhead Flip.prereqs: Str 13, ~`Improved Grapple`~, ~`Improved Unarmed Strike`~, ~`Savage Slam`~, base attack bonus +9 or ~`monk level 6th`~

Overseer of the House of Truth.featname: Overseer of the House of Truth
Overseer of the House of Truth.shortDescription: Gain additional uses of your ~`suggestion`~ suggestion spell-like ability

Overwatch Style.prereqs: Precise Shot, Rapid Shot, Weapon Focus with the chosen weapon

Overwatch Tactician.prereqs: Overwatch Style, Precise Shot, Rapid Shot, Weapon Focus with the chosen weapon
Overwatch Tactician.shortDescription: Ready two ranged attacks as a standard action instead of full-round

Overwatch Vortex.prereqs: Overwatch Style, Overwatch Tactician, Precise Shot, Rapid Shot, Weapon Focus with the chosen weapon, base attack bonus +11
Overwatch Vortex.shortDescription: Ready up to four ranged attacks with Overwatch Style instead of two

Owl Dive.prereqs: Dex 17, Owl Style, Owl Swoop, Skill Focus (Stealth), base attack bonus +7 or monk level 5th, Acrobatics 1 rank, Fly 1 rank, Stealth 1 rank

Owl Style.shortDescription: Use Stealth with martial training and charge with Stealth

Owl Swoop.prereqs: Dex 15, Owl Style, Skill Focus (Stealth), Acrobatics 1 rank, Stealth 1 rank
Owl Swoop.shortDescription: Use Acrobatics with martial training and while charging

Pacify Animal.shortDescription: Use wild empathy against hostile creatures

Pack Attack.shortDescription: Ally's attack allows you to take a 5-foot step

Pack Flanking.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, ability to acquire an animal companion
Pack Flanking.shortDescription: You and your companion creature flank regardless of position

Pack Intimidation.shortDescription: When you use Intimidate to demoralize, gain a +2 circumstance bonus for every ally with this feat within 30 feet

Pack Rat.shortDescription: Locate random items on your person when needed

Pack Tactics.shortDescription: Your companion is treated as having all the same teamwork feats you do

Page.prereqs: Character level 4th, proficiency with martial weapons
Page.shortDescription: You recruit a page who heralds your approach and has the ability to smooth the path of your diplomatic missions.

Painful Anchor.shortDescription: Deal damage to an anchored evil outsider

Painful Blow.prereqs: Vital Strike, base attack bonus +6, Knowledge (arcana) 3 ranks
Painful Blow.shortDescription: Damage you deal with vital strike continues to distract until your next turn

Painful Collision.shortDescription: When you bull rush one creature into another, both take damage

Painful Cures.shortDescription: Inflict nonlethal damage when you heal a creature

Pantheistic Blessing.prereqs: Wis 13, must worship a pantheon of deities
Pantheistic Blessing.shortDescription: Gain a spell-like ability related to the pantheon you worship

Panther Claw.prereqs: Wis 15, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Panther Style
Panther Claw.shortDescription: Retaliate as a free action instead of as a swift action

Panther Parry.prereqs: Wis 15, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Panther Claw, Panther Style
Panther Parry.shortDescription: Retaliatory attacks are resolved before the attack

Panther Style.prereqs: Wis 13, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike.
Panther Style.shortDescription: Retaliate against opponents that take attacks of opportunity against you

Pao-Lung Self-Improvement.prereqs: Must be devoted to the philosophy of Pao- Lung and not worship any deities
Pao-Lung Self-Improvement.shortDescription: Gain an cumulative bonus everytime you fail a specific ability check, caster level check, saving throw, or skill check

Paralyzing Strike.prereqs: Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +14

Parry Spell.shortDescription: Reflect a counterspelled spell back on its caster

Parting Shot.prereqs: Dex 13, Dodge, Mobility, Point-Blank Shot, Shot on the Run, base attack bonus +6.
Parting Shot.shortDescription: Make a ranged attack when withdrawing

Pass For Human.shortDescription: +10 on Disguise checks to look like a human

Passing Grace.shortDescription: Your bond with your allies allows you to share positive energy between yourselves

Passing Trick.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Dodge, Improved Feint, Mobility, size Small or smaller
Passing Trick.shortDescription: Successful Acrobatics check allows you to feint

Pathfinder Society Ally.shortDescription: Gain access to the vast archives of the Pathfinder Society

Pathologist.shortDescription: Improve your ability to treat diseases and poisons with a Heal check

Patient Strike.shortDescription: Ready an attack as a full-round action for a +2 bonus on the attack

Pattern Message.shortDescription: Give a secret message to creatures affected by one of your pattern spells

Peace of Mind.shortDescription: Ignore emotion, fear, or pain effect but be dazed instead

Peacemaker.shortDescription: Increase the save DC of spells that calm others

Peerless Courtier.shortDescription: Bluff, Diplomacy, or Sense Motive with your martial training

Penetrating Possession.prereqs: Magic jar as a known spell or spell-like ability, Cha 21
Penetrating Possession.shortDescription: Gain the chance to dispel a protective spell before attempting possession.

Penetrating Stare.prereqs: Mesmerist level 7th, painful stare class feature

Penetrating Strike.shortDescription: Your attacks ignore 5 points of damage reduction

Perfect Awareness.prereqs: Wis 17, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 9th

Perfect Casting.prereqs: Combat Casting, Divine Dignity, ability to cast divine spells, worshiper of Abadar
Perfect Casting.shortDescription: Benefits of Divine Dignity extend to all divine spells

Perfect Center.prereqs: Wis 21, Combat Meditation, Meditation Master, character level 17th
Perfect Center.shortDescription: Take 10 on any skill check/concentration check, even if not normally allowed.

Perfect Strike.prereqs: Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8
Perfect Strike.shortDescription: Roll twice for attacks with monk weapons and take the better roll

Perfect Style.prereqs: Wis 13; base attack bonus +5 or monk level 5th

Performance Weapon Mastery.shortDescription: All weapons you are proficient with act as if they had the performance quality

Performing Combatant.prereqs: Dazzling Display, any one performance feat
Performing Combatant.shortDescription: Can make combat performance checks in any combat

Pernicious Stab.shortDescription: Forgo sneak attack damage to increase a poison's effectiveness

Persistent Spell.shortDescription: Creatures who saved against a spell must save again

Persuasive.shortDescription: +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate checks

Persuasive Bribery.shortDescription: Bribe effectively and without offending others

Persuasive Performer.prereqs: Versatile performance class feature, worshiper of Shelyn
Persuasive Performer.shortDescription: Use any Perform skill in place of Diplomacy

Perturbing Stare.prereqs: Mesmerist level 5th, painful stare class feature
Perturbing Stare.shortDescription: Painful stare removes foe's Dexterity bonus to AC

Pesh Euphoria.shortDescription: Better resist emotion and fear effects while under pesh

Pesh Healing.shortDescription: Gain temporary hit points after taking pesh

Pesh Rejuvenation.shortDescription: Convert pesh into extra health when dropping unconscious

Pestilent.prereqs: Ability to cause disease via a spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural means
Pestilent.shortDescription: Deal extra damage to those infected with a disease you inflict

Phalanx Formation.shortDescription: When wielding reach weapons, allies do not provide soft cover

Phantom Ally.shortDescription: Calculate your phantom as if 4 levels higher

Phantom Fighter.prereqs: Phantom class feature, phantom with the magic attacks ability
Phantom Fighter.shortDescription: Phantom's natural weapon attacks and delivered spells have full effect on incorporeal creatures

Phantom Fortification.prereqs: Phantom class feature, phantom with the incorporeal flight ability
Phantom Fortification.shortDescription: Phantom has a chance to ignore critical hits and precision-based damage

Phase Strike.shortDescription: Make a weapon attack as a touch attack

Photosynthetic Healing.prereqs: Con 15, change shape ability, leshy subtype

Piercing Chant.shortDescription: Sing a painful song to daze creatures within 15 ft.

Piercing Gambit.prereqs: Spell Penetration or Bluff 3 ranks; caster level 1st

Reject Poison.prereqs: Con 13, poison use class feature, worshiper of Norgorber

Relentless Cheer.prereqs: Halfling, fearless and halfling luck racial traits

Rending Claws.prereqs: Str 13, two claw natural weapon attacks, base attack bonus +6

Rending Fury.prereqs: Base attack bonus +6, rend special attack

Repositioning Strike.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Reposition, base attack bonus +9

Resilient Armor.prereqs: Divine bond (armor or shield), or sacred armor class feature

Resistance Mastery.prereqs: Use Magic Device 3 ranks, base Fortitude saving throw bonus +3

Restoration Mastery.prereqs: Heal 5 ranks, Use Magic Device 5 ranks, base Fortitude saving throw bonus +3

If you have multiple rivals, the GM may keep the specific rival secret, or have many of your enemies work together against you. If your rival is not already a challenging foe, it either advances to become one or allies itself with others one or more creatures who are
Rival.shortDescription: Gain extra skill points or Fame.

Tribal Hunter.shortDescription: Flank large creatures easier when you are adjacent to the target with a friend

Tribe Mentality.shortDescription: Roll saves vs. compulsion/emotion spells with allies, take either result

Trick Riding.shortDescription: Automatically pass simple Ride skill checks

Trick Shooter.prereqs: Dex 13, Deadly Aim, base attack bonus +1
Trick Shooter.shortDescription: +2 bonus when making ranged combat maneuvers

Trick Spell.prereqs: Ability to cast 1st-level spells, chaotic neutral alignment, worshiper of Calistria
Trick Spell.shortDescription: Spells carry with them a dirty trick

Triple-Baron.prereqs: Fey creature type or ~`Fey Obedience`~ (Magdh), you must have collected three gifts worth at least 100 gp each from three different planes across the Great Beyond. At least two of the planes must be diametrically opposed to one another in terms of planar traits
Triple-Baron.shortDescription: Three times per day, you can roll three dice and use the middle result

Tripping Staff.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Weapon Focus (quarterstaff), base attack bonus +6
Tripping Staff.shortDescription: Treat a quarterstaff as if it had the trip weapon special feature

Tripping Strike.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, base attack bonus +9
Tripping Strike.shortDescription: Attempt a trip attack on a successful critical hit

Tripping Twirl.prereqs: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Tripping Staff, Weapon Focus (quarterstaff), Weapon Specialization (quarterstaff), base attack bonus +12
Tripping Twirl.shortDescription: Use a quarterstaff to make a trip attempt against all adjacent enemies

Triton Portal.prereqs: Character level 5th, hydraulic push spell-like ability, undine
Triton Portal.shortDescription: Summon allies with your spell-like abilities

Troth of the Forgotten Pharaoh.prereqs: Must be a member of the Cult of the Forgotten Pharaoh
Troth of the Forgotten Pharaoh.shortDescription: Undergo a ritual to connect yourself with Pharaoh Hakotep I

True Breed.prereqs: Two subtypes, elf blood or orc blood racial trait
True Breed.shortDescription: You count as neither of your subtypes for the purposes of effects related to subtype

True Deception.prereqs: Cha 17, Disguise 17 ranks, master disguise master ninja trick or master of disguise advanced rogue talent, ninja level 10th or rogue level 10th

True Love.prereqs: You must have found love with a person you can't be with, have a current lover, or have the Current Lover, For Love, or The Lover background. Possible complications include distance, your love being with another, your feelings being unrequited, or your relationship being forbidden.
True Love.shortDescription: Increase your skill with emotion spells and Sense Motive

Truth in Wine.shortDescription: Divine truth from the bottom of a barrel

Truth-Seeker.prereqs: You must have visited a ruin or forgotten place that has been abandoned for at least five times as long as you've been alive.
Truth-Seeker.shortDescription: Learn more about history, find secret doors with ease

Tumbling Upset.shortDescription: When you move through an enemy's space, you can attempt to trip them

Tumultuous Spell.shortDescription: Spell causes a target to move in a random direction

Tundra Stride.shortDescription: Increase your base speed by 10-ft. when running, charging, or withdrawing

Tunnel Rat.shortDescription: Count as a smaller size for the purpose of squeezing

Turbulent Takeoff.shortDescription: Prevent creatures from gaining an attack of opportunity when you takeoff

Turn Undead.shortDescription: Channel energy can be used to make undead flee

Twilight Tattoo.prereqs: Wis 13, affiliated with the Twilight Talons
Twilight Tattoo.shortDescription: Gain a magic tattoo that grants benefits

Twilight Words.shortDescription: Improve a creature's attuide using Diplomacy without sharing a language

Twin Fang Lunge.prereqs: Dex 15; Quick Draw; Twin Fang Strike; Twin Fang Style; Two-Weapon Fighting; Acrobatics 8 ranks; base attack bonus +8 or monk level 8th
Twin Fang Lunge.shortDescription: Move up to twice your speed and use Twin Fang Strike

Twin Fang Strike.prereqs: Dex 15; Quick Draw; Twin Fang Style; Two- Weapon Fighting; Acrobatics 6 ranks; base attack bonus +6 or monk level 6th

Twin Thunders Master.shortDescription: Opponent struck by Twin Thunders is shaken

Two-Weapon Feint.prereqs: Dex 15, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Two-Weapon Fighting

Ultimate Mercy.prereqs: Cha 19, Greater Mercy, lay on hands, mercy class feature

Umbral Scion.prereqs: Cha 13, Wis 13, Drow Nobility, Greater Drow Nobility, Improved Drow Nobility, able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow
Umbral Scion.shortDescription: Unlock spell-like abilities marking your place amongst Drow nobility

Unaging.shortDescription: Gain resistance to the effects of aging

Unbalancing Blow.prereqs: Dex 13, Wis 13, ~`Improved Unarmed Strike`~, base attack bonus +4

Unbound Bravery.prereqs: Bravery class feature, worshiper of Cayden Cailean

Uncanny Defense.prereqs: Cautious Fighter, base attack bonus +3, halfling

Undaunted Bravery.prereqs: Bravery class feature, worshiper of Cayden Cailean

Undead Master.prereqs: Spell focus (necromancy), the ability to cast animate dead or command undead

Under and Over.prereqs: Agile Maneuvers, Small size or smaller

Underfoot.prereqs: Dodge, Mobility, Small size or smaller
Underfoot.shortDescription: +4 on Acrobatics checks to move past larger opponents

Underhanded Teamwork.shortDescription: Increase the length of an ally's dirty trick use

Undermine.shortDescription: Create difficult terrain by using combat maneuvers on your enemies

Undermining Exploit.shortDescription: +4 bonus on combat maneuvers against foes on rocky difficult terrain

Unforgotten.prereqs: You must have a close relative, spouse, or other person dear to your heart who never returned from a journey, was captured, or otherwise vanished with little trace, or you have the Major Disaster background.

Unhindering Shield.prereqs: Shield Focus, base attack bonus +6 or fighter level 4th, proficiency with bucklers.
Unhindering Shield.shortDescription: Treat your buckler hand as free for all purposes

Unseen Poison.prereqs: Bluff 5 ranks, Craft (poison) 5 ranks, ability to cast nondetection

Unusual Heritage (Dhampir).shortDescription: Gain a natural bite attack that can deal bleed damage

Unusual Heritage (Fetchling).shortDescription: Create a magical sensor while you sleep that can see into the Shadow Plane

Varisian Tattoo.shortDescription: Gain a cantrip as a spell-like ability

Vast Hatred.shortDescription: Expand your hatred to another two creature types

Vast Spell.shortDescription: Affect more creatures in an area

Veiled Contempt.shortDescription: Increase the DC of Sense Motive checks to get a hunch about you

Vengeance.prereqs: You must have a close family member or other loved one slain by a specific challenging foe or that foe's minions, or have the Raiders or Vengeance background.

Verify.prereqs: Ability to cast 1st-level spells, lawful evil alignment, worshiper of Asmodeus

Versatile Channeler.prereqs: Channel energy class feature, necromancer or neutrally aligned cleric (see below)

Virtuous Creed.shortDescription: Follow a heavenly virtue to gain unique abilities

Visceral Threat.shortDescription: Use Intimidate instead of Bluff to feint

Viscous Venom.shortDescription: Entangle creatures with your racial poison

Vishkanya Perfume.prereqs: Deadly Kiss, toxic racial trait, vishkanya

Vision Mastery.prereqs: Use Magic Device 2 ranks, base Fortitude save bonus +4

Voice of Beasts.shortDescription: Can speak with animals while in wild shape form

Voracious Blade.prereqs: Weapon Focus (rhoka sword), base attack bonus +4, urdefhan

Vulpine Pounce.prereqs: Swift Kitsune Shapechanger, base attack bonus +10, kitsune
Vulpine Pounce.shortDescription: Gain pounce when charging and shifting in the same round.

Walking Sleight.prereqs: Deft Hands, Sleight of Hand 5 ranks
Walking Sleight.shortDescription: Use Sleight of Hand as a move action or during a move

Wall of Flesh.shortDescription: Increase your size modifier with combat maneuvers

Wand Dancer.shortDescription: Move before and after using a spell trigger item

Wanderer's Fortune.shortDescription: Gain freedom of movement to escape a grapple or magical restraint

Wandering Mind.shortDescription: Reroll a failed Will save against a mind-affecting ability

War Blessing.shortDescription: Gain a lesser use of the blessings class feature

War Singer.prereqs: Cha 13, bardic performance class feature, half-orc or orc

Warding Blood.shortDescription: You can paint your blood on a room to create a forbiddance effect

Warning Shot.prereqs: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Weapon Focus, proficiency with the selected weapon

Warped Mind.shortDescription: Resist those that attempt to read your thoughts

Warrior Priest.prereqs: Ability to cast divine spells, domain or mystery class feature

Wasp Familiar.prereqs: Chaotic neutral alignment, worshiper of Calistria

Water Skinned.shortDescription: Extinguish small flames with a touch

Wave Strike.prereqs: Weapon expertise class feature or Quick Draw, Bluff 1 rank
Wave Strike.shortDescription: Spend a swift action to make a Bluff check to feint

We are the Wall.prereqs: Be a member of House Darahan, or have the Champion of the People, Duty, or Raider background
We are the Wall.shortDescription: 3 times per day, you can declare a creature to be your quarry

Weapon Bearer.prereqs: Character level 4th, proficient with all martial weapons
Weapon Bearer.shortDescription: You attract a weapon bearer to aid you in your endeavors.

Weapon Evoker Mastery.prereqs: Use Magic Device 2 ranks, base Fortitude saving throw bonus +3

Weapon Finesse.shortDescription: Use Dex instead of Str on attack rolls with light weapons

Weapon Focus.prereqs: Proficiency with weapon, base attack bonus +1

Weapon Material Mastery.prereqs: Base attack bonus +7, weapon training class feature with a melee weapon

Weapon Style Mastery.prereqs: Any two style feats from different styles, base attack bonus +6, weapon training class feature with a melee weapon
Weapon Style Mastery.shortDescription: Have two weapon styles active at once

Weapon Trick.shortDescription: Learn weapon tricks with a specifics style of weapon

Weapon Versatility.shortDescription: Deal different types of damage with your favored weapon

Weather Eye.shortDescription: +4 Survival bonus to predict the weather, +1 save vs. extreme weather

Weathered Warrior.shortDescription: Avoid some penalties on your ranged attacks in strong or severe winds

Welcome Pain.shortDescription: Shed conditions before they would bring you unconscious.

Well-Prepared.shortDescription: Retrieve a specific mundane item from your person

Wheeling Charge.prereqs: Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack, Ride 5 ranks, Lastwall affinity

Whip Mastery.shortDescription: Using a whip does not provoke attacks of opportunity

Whipcrack.prereqs: Int 13, ~`Combat Expertise`~, ~`Improved Reposition`~, base attack bonus +3 or ~`monk level 1st`~
Whipcrack.shortDescription: You can use a reposition manuever to throw the creature

Whip-Slinger.shortDescription: Threaten the area around you with a sling

Whirlwind Attack.prereqs: Dex 13, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Dodge, Mobility, Spring Attack, base attack bonus +4
Whirlwind Attack.shortDescription: Make one melee attack against all foes within reach

Whispered Knowledge.shortDescription: Enhance your undead form with secret knowledge

Whispering Way Disciple.shortDescription: Get access to unholy magic from the Whispering Way

Wicked Valor.shortDescription: Heal twice as much while resting.

Wild Flanking.shortDescription: Hit an enemy with stronger power attacks, but risk damaging your allies

Wild Growth Channel.prereqs: Channel positive energy class feature, Plant domain

Wild Growth Hex.prereqs: Hex class feature; summer, thorns, or woodlands patron
Wild Growth Hex.shortDescription: Cause disruptive thorny plants to grow at the feet of victims of a chosen hex

Wild Speaker.shortDescription: You can use speak with animals at will

Wild Speech.prereqs: Druid level 6th, wild shape class feature

Wild Vigor.shortDescription: Gain temporary hit points equal to your base attack bonus when you use wild shape

Wilding.prereqs: Any neutral alignment, must be taken at 1st level

Wilding Mind.shortDescription: Can take 1d3 Int damage to reroll a failed saving through versus a fear effect or versus a mind-affecting effect

Willing Accomplice.prereqs: Cha 13, Bluff 3 ranks, Sense Motive 1 rank

Willing Death.shortDescription: You can cast paladin's sacrifice to prevent an ally from dying

Wily Warrior.prereqs: Bluff 1 rank, Sense Motive 1 rank, base attack bonus +1, or you must have the Military Strategist background (page 5)
Wily Warrior.shortDescription: Use your ranks in Sense Motive in place of your Will save.

Wind Rider.shortDescription: Increase your fly speed while in strong wind

Wind Song.prereqs: Perform (wind instruments) 5 ranks; bardic performance or raging song class feature

Winter's Strike.prereqs: Nature Magic or the ability to cast druid or ranger spells; Vital Strike, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks
Winter's Strike.shortDescription: Target of your Vital Strike must successfully save or become fatigued

Witch Knife.shortDescription: Use dagger as focus for witch patron spells

Witchbreaker.shortDescription: Gain a +2 bonus on saves against effects from hags and witches; can potentially break their mind-affecting effects on allies with successful critical hits

Witty Feint.prereqs: Bluff 1 rank, weapon training class feature, gnome
Witty Feint.shortDescription: Improve your own AC instead of harming your enemy's when feinting in combat

Wolf Rider.prereqs: Undersized Mount or effective level 7th in the class that grants the mount or divine bond (mount) class feature; Knowledge (nature) 1 rank; mount or divine bond (mount) class feature
Wolf Rider.shortDescription: Can select wolf as your mount, and Knowledge (nature) is a class skill

Wolf Savage.prereqs: Wis 17, Improved Unarmed Strike, Wolf Style, Wolf Trip, Knowledge (nature) 9 ranks
Wolf Savage.shortDescription: Do ability damage or fatigue  prone foe when you deal at least 10 points of damage to it with a natural weapon or unarmed strike

Wolf Style.prereqs: Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (nature) 3 ranks
Wolf Style.shortDescription: Decrease a foe's speed when you deal at least 10 points of damage with an attack of opportunity

Wolf Trip.prereqs: Wis 15, Improved Unarmed Strike, Wolf Style, Knowledge (nature) 6 ranks
Wolf Trip.shortDescription: Gain a +2 bonus on trip attempts you make as part of an attack of opportunity

Wood Crafter.shortDescription: Gain +4 bonus on Craft (armor) checks when working with wood, can sometimes craft items at a discount

Woodland Wraith.shortDescription: Gain concealment when withdrawing or taking multiple actions and ending movement in naturally occurring difficult terrain

Word of Healing.shortDescription: Use lay on hands from a distance

Worldwound Walker.prereqs: 5 or more Hit Dice, good alignment.
Worldwound Walker.shortDescription: Protect yourself from effects which target good creatures

Worst Case Jinx.shortDescription: Hinder the effects of beneficial spells with your jinx

Wounded Paw Gambit.shortDescription: When you use Broken Wing Gambit, nearby allies can attempt a ranged attack against the attacker

Wrest Charge.shortDescription: Jury-rig a depleted battery to hold 1 charge

Wretched Curator.prereqs: You must have purchased a scroll or spellbook containing a spell with the evil descriptor in a place where such dealings are illegal, or must have the Secret Society Inductee or Diabolical Upbringing background
Wretched Curator.shortDescription: Purchase evil items cheaper, bonus to checks to understand evil items

Wrist Grab.prereqs: Dex 13, Int 13, ~`Combat Expertise`~, ~`Combat Reflexes`~, ~`Improved Disarm`~, ~`Improved Unarmed Strike`~, base attack bonus +6
Wrist Grab.shortDescription: Immediate disarm when your opponent misses by 5 or more

Wyvern Fury Style.prereqs: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (whip), Acrobatics 3 ranks, brawler's flurry class feature or flurry of blows class feature
Wyvern Fury Style.shortDescription: Use daggers and whips with your flurry.

Wyvern Sting.prereqs: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (whip), Wyvern Fury Style, Acrobatics 6 ranks, brawler's flurry class feature or flurry of blows class feature
Wyvern Sting.shortDescription: When using Wyvern Style, you can use a whip to force an enemy to focus on you.

Wyvern Wing.prereqs: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (whip), Wyvern Fury Style, Wyvern Sting, Acrobatics 10 ranks, brawler's flurry class feature or flurry of blows class feature
Wyvern Wing.shortDescription: Make an additional 5ft step between attacks when using Wyvern Style

Xenoglossy.shortDescription: Use Linguistics to communicate with creatures with which you don't share a language

Yai-Mimic Spell.shortDescription: Modify a ray spell to fire from your forehead, granting you brief regeneration

Zealous Mind.prereqs: Iron Will, Unimpeachable Honor, lawful alignment
